represents the program areas of the Outer Continental Shelf that have been included in the 2017-2022 Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Draft Proposed Program.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:abstract>          <gmd:purpose>             <gco:CharacterString>This file represents the program areas of the Outer Continental Shelf that have been included in the 2017-2022 Outer Continental Shelf Oil and Gas Leasing Draft Proposed Program. On January 27, 2015, Secretary Jewell announced the Draft Proposed Program (DPP) for a 2017-2022 Program. The DPP includes eight planning areas\ufffd\ufffd€”three in the Gulf of Mexico, two in the Atlantic, and three in Alaska\ufffd\ufffd€”and nearly 80% of estimated undiscovered technically available oil and gas resources on the U.S. Outer Continental Shelf. The DPP schedules 14 potential lease sales in those areas for the 2017\ufffd\ufffd€“2022 period in eight program areas \ufffd\ufffd€“ 10 sales in the Gulf of Mexico, one in the Atlantic (which would cover portions of two planning areas) and three off the coast of Alaska.</gco:CharacterString>          </gmd:purpose>          <gmd:status>             <gmd:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://www.isotc211.org/2005/resources/Codelist/gmxCodelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode"                                  codeListValue="completed">completed</gmd:MD_ProgressCode>
